href="/s/458-5905564-5122958/ref=gwgfloorv1_AGS_Header_1?_encoding=UTF8&bbn=1403206071&ie=UTF8&rh=i%3Abeauty%2Cn%3A1403206071%2Cn%3A746776051&sort=discount-rank&pf_rd_p=c3f808b3-b344-4372-bd50-fcfe737492f9&pf_rd_s=desktop-4&pf_rd_t=36701&pf_rd_i=desktop&pf_rd_m=A1AJ19PSB66TGU&pf_rd_r=1GTGN01SM21QXNZNQZNY&pf_rd_r=1GTGN01SM21QXNZNQZNY&pf_rd_p=c3f808b3-b344-4372-bd50-fcfe737492f9"> &#x7f8e;&#x5986;</a></li><li style="width:5px;color:#ababab">&bull;</li><li><a href="/s/458-5905564-5122958/ref=gwgfloorv1_AGS_Header_2?_encoding=UTF8&bbn=1403206071&ie=UTF8&rh=i%3Aapparel%2Cn%3A1403206071%2Cn%3A2016156051%2Cn%3A%212016157051%2Cn%3A865184051%2Cp_n_special_merchandising_browse-bin%3A1414288071&pf_rd_p=c3f808b3-b344-4372-bd50-fcfe737492f9&pf_rd_s=desktop-4&pf_rd_t=36701&pf_rd_i=desktop&pf_rd_m=A1AJ19PSB66TGU&pf_rd_r=1GTGN01SM21QXNZNQZNY&pf_rd_r=1GTGN01SM21QXNZNQZNY&pf_rd_p=c3f808b3-b344-4372-bd50-fcfe737492f9"> &#x7bb1;&#x5305;</a></li><li style="width:5px;color:#ababab">&bull;</li><li><a href="/b/458-5905564-5122958/ref=gwgfloorv1_AGS_Header_3?_encoding=UTF8&ie=UTF8&node=1494166071&pf_rd_p=c3f808b3-b344-4372-bd50-fcfe737492f9&pf_rd_s=desktop-4&pf_rd_t=36701&pf_rd_i=desktop&pf_rd_m=A1AJ19PSB66TGU&pf_rd_r=1GTGN01SM21QXNZNQZNY&pf_rd_r=1GTGN01SM21QXNZNQZNY&pf_rd_p=c3f808b3-b344-4372-bd50-fcfe737492f9"> &#x70ed;&#x95e8;&#x54c1;&#x724c;</a></li></ul></div></div><div class="gfloorContent" id="AGSgfloorcontent"></div></div></div>

<script type="text/javascript">
var AGSgfloorstatus = 0;
function AGScheck($){
    var windowtop  = $(window).scrollTop();
    var windowfoot = windowtop+$(window).height();
    var preheight  = 400;
    var thisfloor  = $('#AGSgfloor');
    var floorheight= 470;
    var floortop   = thisfloor.offset().top;
    var floorfoot  = floortop+floorheight;
    if ((floortop>windowfoot && floortop<windowfoot+preheight) 
        || (floorfoot<windowtop && floorfoot+preheight>windowtop) 
        || (floorfoot>windowtop && floortop<windowfoot)){
            AGSgfloorstatus = 1;
            AGSRender($);
            $(window).resize(function(){
                AGSresize($, thisfloor,0);
            });
    }
}
function AGSresize($,thisfloor,status){
    var screenwidth = thisfloor.width();
    if (screenwidth>=1470){
        alterfloor(7);
    } else if (screenwidth<1470 && screenwidth>=1260){
        changesize(1470,7);
    } else if (screenwidth<1260 && screenwidth>=1080) {
        changesize(1260,6);
    } else if (screenwidth<1080 && screenwidth>=1040) {
        alterfloor(5);
    } else if (screenwidth<1040 && screenwidth>=900) {
        changesize(1040,5);
    } else if (screenwidth<900 && screenwidth>=840) {
        alterfloor(4);
    } else if (screenwidth<840 && screenwidth>=720) {
        changesize(840,4);
    } else if (screenwidth<720) {
        alterfloor(3);
    }
    function alterfloor(showNumber){
        var floorContent = thisfloor.find('.gfloorContent');
        var header = thisfloor.find('.gfloorHeader');
        var firstline = thisfloor.find('.gfloor-first-line');
        var secondline = thisfloor.find('.gfloor-second-line');
        hidecell(firstline,showNumber);
        hidecell(secondline,showNumber);
        floorContent.width(210*showNumber);
        header.width(210*showNumber);
        thisfloor.find('.gfloorfbrand').css({'margin-top':30});
        thisfloor.find('.gfloorsbrand').css({'margin-top':30});
        firstline.width(210*showNumber);firstline.height(210);
        secondline.width(210*showNumber);secondline.height(210);
        thisfloor.find('.gfloorcell').width(210);
        thisfloor.find('.gfloorcell').height(210);
        thisfloor.find('.gfloorbigprice').css({'font-size':42});
        thisfloor.find('.gfnewContent').css({'font-size':24});
        thisfloor.find('.gfcontentbuy').css({'bottom':40});
    }
    
    function changesize(maxWdith,showNumber){
        var floorContent = thisfloor.find('.gfloorContent');
        var header = thisfloor.find('.gfloorHeader');
        var losswidth = maxWdith - screenwidth;
        var perlosswidth = losswidth / showNumber;
        var firstline = thisfloor.find('.gfloor-first-line');
        var secondline = thisfloor.find('.gfloor-second-line');
        hidecell(firstline,showNumber);
        hidecell(secondline,showNumber);
        var allwidth = 210*showNumber-losswidth
        floorContent.width(allwidth);
        header.width(allwidth);
        thisfloor.find('.gfloorfbrand').css({'margin-top':30-perlosswidth/3});
        thisfloor.find('.gfloorsbrand').css({'margin-top':30-perlosswidth/3});
        firstline.width(allwidth+1);firstline.height(210-perlosswidth);
        secondline.width(allwidth+1);secondline.height(210-perlosswidth);
        thisfloor.find('.gfloorcell').width(210-perlosswidth);
        thisfloor.find('.gfloorcell').height(210-perlosswidth);
        thisfloor.find('.gfloorbigprice').css({'font-size':42-perlosswidth/3});
        thisfloor.find('.gfnewContent').css({'font-size':24-perlosswidth/10});
        thisfloor.find('.gfcontentbuy').css({'bottom':40-perlosswidth/3});
    }
    function hideType(fline, lossNum, typename){
        var hideCell = fline.find(typename);
        var hideSize = hideCell.length;
        if (lossNum>0){
            for (var i=hideSize-1;i>=0;i--){
                hideCell[i].style.display='none';
                lossNum--;
                if (lossNum<=0){
                    for (var j=i-1;j>=0;j--)
                        hideCell[j].style.display='block';
                    break;
                }
            }
        } else {
            for (var j=0;j<hideSize;j++)
                hideCell[j].style.display='block';
        }
        return lossNum;
    }
    function hidecell(fline,showNumber){
        var lossNumber = 7-showNumber;
        lossNumber = hideType(fline,lossNumber, '.gfloorhotword');
        lossNumber = hideType(fline,lossNumber, '.gfloorasinbs');
        
        var promotionCell = fline.find('.gfloorpromotiontext');
        var asinCell = fline.find('.gfloorasincell');
        var promotionSize = promotionCell.length;
        var asinSize = asinCell.length;
        
        if (lossNumber>0){
            var lossPACell = asinSize*2-(showNumber-1);
            if (lossPACell<0)
                lossPACell = 0;
            var lossPair = Math.floor(lossPACell/2);
            for (var i=0;i<lossPair;i++){
                promotionCell[promotionSize-i-1] && promotionCell[promotionSize-i-1].style && (promotionCell[promotionSize-i-1].style.display = 'none');
                asinCell[asinSize-i-1] && asinCell[asinSize-i-1].style && (asinCell[asinSize-i-1].style.display = 'none');
            }
            if (lossPACell%2==1){
                asinCell[asinSize-lossPair-1] && asinCell[asinSize-lossPair-1].style && (asinCell[asinSize-lossPair-1].style.display='none');
                promotionCell[asinSize-lossPair-1] && promotionCell[asinSize-lossPair-1].style && (promotionCell[asinSize-lossPair-1].style.display='block');
            } else {
                asinCell[asinSize-lossPair-1] && asinCell[asinSize-lossPair-1].style && (asinCell[asinSize-lossPair-1].style.display='block');
                promotionCell[asinSize-lossPair-1] && promotionCell[asinSize-lossPair-1].style && (promotionCell[asinSize-lossPair-1].style.display='block');
            }
            for (var i=0;i<asinSize-lossPair-1;i++){
                asinCell[i] && asinCell[i].style && (asinCell[i].style.display='block');
                promotionCell[i] && promotionCell[i].style && (promotionCell[i].style.display='block');
            }
        } else {
            for (var j=0;j<asinSize;j++){
                asinCell[j] && asinCell[j].style && (asinCell[j].style.display='block');
                promotionCell[j] && promotionCell[j].style && (promotionCell[j].style.display='block');
            }
        }
        
        
    }
}
function AGSRender($){
    $.ajax({
        type: 'POST',
        url: '/gp/grid-floor-widget/ajaxGetGridContent.html/458-5905564-5122958',
        data: {"floorType":"AGS","rId":"1GTGN01SM21QXNZNQZNY","arrow":"https://images-cn.ssl-images-amazon.com/images/G/28/gwfloor/static/images/arrow_small_white._CB304609528_.png","redirectUrl":"#?pf_rd_p=c3f808b3-b344-4372-bd50-fcfe737492f9&pf_rd_s=desktop-4&pf_rd_t=36701&pf_rd_i=desktop&pf_rd_m=A1AJ19PSB66TGU&pf_rd_r=1GTGN01SM21QXNZNQZNY&pf_rd_r=1GTGN01SM21QXNZNQZNY&pf_rd_p=c3f808b3-b344-4372-bd50-fcfe737492f9"},
        dataType: 'text',
        cache: false,
        contentType: 'application/x-www-form-urlencoded; charset=utf-8',
        timeout: 40000,
        success: function(data) {
            data = eval('('+data+')');
            var contentHtml = data.contentHtml;
            $('#AGSgfloorcontent').append(contentHtml);
            $('#AGSgfloorcontent .gfloorasincelldiv').css({'opacity':0.85});
            $('#AGSgfloorcontent .gfloorblockcell').css({'opacity':0.8});
            $('#AGSgfloorcontent .gfloorasincelldiv').hover(
                function(){
                    $(this).stop(true,true).animate({opacity:0.95},200);
                },
                function(){
                    $(this).stop(true,true).animate({opacity:0.85},200);
                }
            );
            $('#AGSgfloorcontent .gfloorblockcell').hover(
                function(){
                    $(this).stop(true,true).animate({opacity:0.9},200);
                },
                function(){
                    $(this).stop(true,true).animate({opacity:0.8},200);
                }
            );
            $('#AGSgfloorcontent .gfloorpromotiontext').hover(
                function(){
                    $(this).find('.gfcontentbspan').css({'color':'#E47911'});
                },
                function(){
                    $(this).find('.gfcontentbspan').css({'color':'#767676'});
                }
            );
            $('#AGSgfloorcontent .gfloorbstext').hover(
                function(){
                    $(this).find('.gfcontentbspan').css({'color':'#E47911'});
                },
                function(){
                    $(this).find('.gfcontentbspan').css({'color':'#767676'});
                }
            );
            AGSresize($, $('#AGSgfloor'),1);
        }
    });
}
if (typeof amznJQ !== 'undefined'){
    amznJQ.available('jQuery',function(){
        var $ = jQuery;
        var thisfloor = $('#AGSgfloor');
        AGScheck($);
        $(window).scroll(function(){
            if (AGSgfloorstatus == 0){
                AGScheck($);
            }
        });
    });
} else if (typeof P !== 'undefined'){
    P.when('A').execute(function(A){
        var $ = A.$;
        var thisfloor = $('#AGSgfloor');
        AGScheck($);
        $(window).scroll(function(){
            if (AGSgfloorstatus == 0){
                AGScheck($);
            }
        });
    });
}
</script>







  </div>
    <hr class='slot-hr desktop-4-hr' />

    
    
    

    
  <div class='desktop-row gw-widget-instrument' id='desktop-6'>
    






<style>

.gfloor {text-align:center;margin-top:50px;margin-bottom:10px;background-color:white;font-color:black;font-family: CN Hiragino SansGB, Microsoft Yahei, Heiti,sans-serif EN Helvetica,Arial,sans-serif}
.gfloorHolder {display:inline-block;}
.gfloorHeader {width:1470px;height:45px; background-color:white;}
.gfloorHeaderSplit {height:20px;width:0px;float:left;margin-top:9px;border:1px solid gray;}
.gfloorTitle {float:left;margin-left:8px;width:155px; height:41px; background-color:white;}
.gfloortitleimg {float:left;width:40px;height: 40px;background-color: #ffffff;}
.gfloortitleimg>img{width:40px;height:40px;}
.gfloortitlecontent {float:left;width:110px;height:26px;margin-top:5px;padding-left:2px;}
.gfloortitlecontent>span {font-size:20px;font-weight:700;line-height:26px;}
.gfloorHeaderLinks ul {float:left;list-style-type:none;margin:0px;padding-left:10px;padding-top:5px;}
.gfloorHeaderLinks ul li{float:left;margin-right:10px;margin-top:5px;list-style:none;}
.gfloorHeaderLinks ul li a{color:#333333;font-family: CN Hiragino SansGB, Microsoft Yahei, Heiti,sans-serif EN Helvetica,Arial,sans-serif;font-size:14px;}
.gfloorHeaderLinks ul li a:hover{color:#fc9900;text-decoration:none;}
.gfloor-first-line {width:1470px;;height:210px;border:0px;}
.gfloor-second-line {width:1470px;;height:210px;border:0px;} 
.gfloorcell {position:relative;width:210px;height:210px;float:left;line-height:initial;}
.gfloorContent {width:1470px;height:auto;position:relative;}
.gfbigContent {display:inline-block;height:68px;font-size:22px;font-weight:bold;margin-top:5px;}
.gfbigContent span {vertical-align:middle;}
.gfnewContent {display:inline-block;height:68px;line-height:30px;font-size:21px;font-weight:bold;margin-top:5px;}
.gfnewContent > .lastLine {display:block;overflow:hidden;text-overflow:ellipsis;white-space:nowrap;}
.gfnewContent span {vertical-align:middle;}
.gfcontentbspan {font-size:12px;color:#767676;}
.gfloorbigprice {font-size:38px;font-family:helvetica,arial,verdana,sans-serif}
.gfloorkeyword,.gfloorkeywordspan {display:block;}
.gfloorbstext a:hover,.gfloorasinbs a,.gfloorasinbs a:hover;.gfloorasinbs a:visited,.gfloorasinbs a:link{font-size:12px;}
.gfcellcontent {font-family:Microsoft Yahei;color: #333;text-align:center;height:100%;}
.gfcontent_header {margin-top:35px;width:170px;height:29px;overflow:hidden;display:inline-block;}
.gfloorpromotiontext a:hover,.gfloorpromotiona:link,.gfloorpromotion a:visited,.gfloorpromotion a{text-decoration:none;}
.gfloorasincelldiv {height:100%;background-color:white;opacity:0.85;}
.gfloorblockcell {height:100%;background-color:white;opacity:0.8;}
.gfloorbsbadge,.gfloornrbadge {left:5px;z-index:1;position:absolute;text-align:center;width:20px;height:100%;}
<!--.gfloorbsbadge ul{color:#E67A00;}
.gfloornrbadge ul{color:#63AB4C;}-->
.gfloorbsbadge ul,.gfloornrbadge ul{color:#333;font-family:Microsoft Yahei;font-weight:bold;font-size:15px;top:40px;position:relative;vertical-align:middle;width:19px;list-style-type:none;margin:0px;padding:0px;display:inline-block;}
.gfloorbsbadge ul li,.gfloornrbadge ul li {overflow:hidden;height:18px;width:20px;margin:0px;}
.gfloorbrand ul,.gfloorkeyword ul,.gfloortextlink ul{width:80px;list-style-type:none;margin:0px;padding:0px;display:inline-block;}
.gfloorbrand ul li,.gfloorkeyword ul li,.gfloortextlink ul li {overflow:hidden;height:20px;width:75px;margin:0px;}
.gfloorkeyword a,.gfloorbrand a{font-family: CN Hiragino SansGB, Microsoft Yahei, Heiti,sans-serif EN Helvetica,Arial,sans-serif;font-size:14px;color:#767676;}
.gfloorkeyword a:hover,.gfloorkeyword a:active,.gfloorbrand a:hover,.gfloorbrand a:active {color:#fc9900;text-decoration:none;}
.gfloorarrow {position:absolute;z-index:1;top:45%;width:0px;height:0px;border-top:10px solid rgba(0,0,0,0);border-bottom: 10px solid rgba(0, 0, 0, 0);border-left: 10px solid #008000;}
</style>


<div class="gfloor" id="SOFTLINEgfloor"><div class="gfloorHolder"><div class="gfloorHeader"><div class="gfloorTitle"><div class="gfloortitleimg"><img src="https://images-cn.ssl-images-amazon.com/images/G/28/gwfloor/static/images/dy_softline._CB334700282_.png" style="width:40px;height:40px;"></div><div class="gfloortitlecontent"><span>&#x6f6e;&#x6d41;&#x65f6;&#x5c1a;&#x9986;</span></div></div><div class="gfloorHeaderSplit"></div><div class="gfloorHeaderLinks"><ul><li><a href="/b/458-5905564-5122958/ref=gwgfloorv1_SOFTLINE_Header_0?_encoding=UTF8&ie=UTF8&ie=UTF8&node=2016156051&pf_rd_p=14fd1035-03b1-43cb-9e50-16cf9d41f686&pf_rd_s=desktop-6&pf_rd_t=36701&pf_rd_i=desktop&pf_rd_m=A1AJ19PSB66TGU&pf_rd_r=1GTGN01SM21QXNZNQZNY&pf_rd_r=1GTGN01SM21QXNZNQZNY&pf_rd_p=14fd1035-03b1-43cb-9e50-16cf9d41f686"> &#x670d;&#x88c5;</a></li><li style="width:5px;color:#ababab">&bull;</li><li><a href="/b/458-5905564-5122958/ref=gwgfloorv1_SOFTLINE_Header_1?_encoding=UTF8&ie=UTF8&ie=UTF8&node=2029189051&pf_rd_p=14fd1035-03b1-43cb-9e50-16cf9d41f686&pf_rd_s=desktop-6&pf_rd_t=36701&pf_rd_i=desktop&pf_rd_m=A1AJ19PSB66TGU&pf_rd_r=1GTGN01SM21QXNZNQZNY&pf_rd_r=1GTGN01SM21QXNZNQZNY&pf_rd_p=14fd1035-03b1-43cb-9e50-16cf9d41f686"> &#x978b;&#x9774;</a></li><li style="width:5px;color:#ababab">&bull;</li><li><a href="/b/458-5905564-5122958/ref=gwgfloorv1_SOFTLINE_Header_2?_encoding=UTF8&ie=UTF8&ie=UTF8&node=865184051&pf_rd_p=14fd1035-03b1-43cb-9e50-16cf9d41f686&pf_rd_s=desktop-6&pf_rd_t=36701&pf_rd_i=desktop&pf_rd_m=A1AJ19PSB66TGU&pf_rd_r=1GTGN01SM21QXNZNQZNY&pf_rd_r=1GTGN01SM21QXNZNQZNY&pf_rd_p=14fd1035-03b1-43cb-9e50-16cf9d41f686"> &#x7bb1;&#x5305;</a></li><li style="width:5px;color:#ababab">&bull;</li><li><a href="/b/458-5905564-5122958/ref=gwgfloorv1_SOFTLINE_Header_3?_encoding=UTF8&ie=UTF8&ie=UTF8&node=1953164051&pf_rd_p=14fd1035-03b1-43cb-9e50-16cf9d41f686&pf_rd_s=desktop-6&pf_rd_t=36701&pf_rd_i=desktop&pf_rd_m=A1AJ19PSB66TGU&pf_rd_r=1GTGN01SM21QXNZNQZNY&pf_rd_r=1GTGN01SM21QXNZNQZNY&pf_rd_p=14fd1035-03b1-43cb-9e50-16cf9d41f686"> &#x949f;&#x8868;</a></li><li style="width:5px;color:#ababab">&bull;</li><li><a href="/b/458-5905564-5122958/ref=gwgfloorv1_SOFTLINE_Header_4?_encoding=UTF8&ie=UTF8&ie=UTF8&node=816482051&pf_rd_p=14fd1035-03b1-43cb-9e50-16cf9d41f686&pf_rd_s=desktop-6&pf_rd_t=36701&pf_rd_i=desktop&pf_rd_m=A1AJ19PSB66TGU&pf_rd_r=1GTGN01SM21QXNZNQZNY&pf_rd_r=1GTGN01SM21QXNZNQZNY&pf_rd_p=14fd1035-03b1-43cb-9e50-16cf9d41f686"> &#x73e0;&#x5b9d;</a></li></ul></div></div><div class="gfloorContent" id="SOFTLINEgfloorcontent"></div></div></div>

<script type="text/javascript">
var SOFTLINEgfloorstatus = 0;
function SOFTLINEcheck($){
    var windowtop  = $(window).scrollTop();
    var windowfoot = windowtop+$(window).height();
    var preheight  = 400;
    var thisfloor  = $('#SOFTLINEgfloor');
    var floorheight= 470;
    var floortop   = thisfloor.offset().top;
    var floorfoot  = floortop+floorheight;
    if ((floortop>windowfoot && floortop<windowfoot+preheight) 
        || (floorfoot<windowtop && floorfoot+preheight>windowtop) 
        || (floorfoot>windowtop && floortop<windowfoot)){
            SOFTLINEgfloorstatus = 1;
            SOFTLINERender($);
            $(window).resize(function(){
                SOFTLINEresize($, thisfloor,0);
            });
    }
}
function SOFTLINEresize($,thisfloor,status){
    var screenwidth = thisfloor.width();
    if (screenwidth>=1470){
        alterfloor(7);
    } else if (screenwidth<1470 && screenwidth>=1260){
        changesize(1470,7);
    } else if (screenwidth<1260 && screenwidth>=1080) {
        changesize(1260,6);
    } else if (screenwidth<1080 && screenwidth>=1040) {
        alterfloor(5);
    } else if (screenwidth<1040 && screenwidth>=900) {
        changesize(1040,5);
    } else if (screenwidth<900 && screenwidth>=840) {
        alterfloor(4);
    } else if (screenwidth<840 && screenwidth>=720) {
        changesize(840,4);
    } else if (screenwidth<720) {
        alterfloor(3);
    }
    function alterfloor(showNumber){
        var floorContent = thisfloor.find('.gfloorContent');
        var header = thisfloor.find('.gfloorHeader');
        var firstline = thisfloor.find('.gfloor-first-line');
        var secondline = thisfloor.find('.gfloor-second-line');
        hidecell(firstline,showNumber);
        hidecell(secondline,showNumber);
        floorContent.width(210*showNumber);
        header.width(210*showNumber);
        thisfloor.find('.gfloorfbrand').css({'margin-top':30});
        thisfloor.find('.gfloorsbrand').css({'margin-top':30});
        firstline.width(210*showNumber);firstline.height(210);
        secondline.width(210*showNumber);secondline.height(210);
        thisfloor.find('.gfloorcell').width(210);
        thisfloor.find('.gfloorcell').height(210);
        thisfloor.find('.gfloorbigprice').css({'font-size':42});
        thisfloor.find('.gfnewContent').css({'font-size':24});
        thisfloor.find('.gfcontentbuy').css({'bottom':40});
    }
    
    function changesize(maxWdith,showNumber){
        var floorContent = thisfloor.find('.gfloorContent');
        var header = thisfloor.find('.gfloorHeader');
        var losswidth = maxWdith - screenwidth;
        var perlosswidth = losswidth / showNumber;
        var firstline = thisfloor.find('.gfloor-first-line');
        var secondline = thisfloor.find('.gfloor-second-line');
        hidecell(firstline,showNumber);
        hidecell(secondline,showNumber);
        var allwidth = 210*showNumber-losswidth
        floorContent.width(allwidth);
        header.width(allwidth);
        thisfloor.find('.gfloorfbrand').css({'margin-top':30-perlosswidth/3});
        thisfloor.find('.gfloorsbrand').css({'margin-top':30-perlosswidth/3});
        firstline.width(allwidth+1);firstline.height(210-perlosswidth);
        secondline.width(allwidth+1);secondline.height(210-perlosswidth);
        thisfloor.find('.gfloorcell').width(210-perlosswidth);
        thisfloor.find('.gfloorcell').height(210-perlosswidth);
        thisfloor.find('.gfloorbigprice').css({'font-size':42-perlosswidth/3});
        thisfloor.find('.gfnewContent').css({'font-size':24-perlosswidth/10});
        thisfloor.find('.gfcontentbuy').css({'bottom':40-perlosswidth/3});
    }
    function hideType(fline, lossNum, typename){
        var hideCell = fline.find(typename);
        var hideSize = hideCell.length;
        if (lossNum>0){
            for (var i=hideSize-1;i>=0;i--){
                hideCell[i].style.display='none';
                lossNum--;
                if (lossNum<=0){
                    for (var j=i-1;j>=0;j--)
                        hideCell[j].style.display='block';
                    break;
                }
            }
        } else {
            for (var j=0;j<hideSize;j++)
                hideCell[j].style.display='block';
        }
        return lossNum;
    }
    function hidecell(fline,showNumber){
        var lossNumber = 7-showNumber;
        lossNumber = hideType(fline,lossNumber, '.gfloorhotword');
        lossNumber = hideType(fline,lossNumber, '.gfloorasinbs');
        
        var promotionCell = fline.find('.gfloorpromotiontext');
        var asinCell = fline.find('.gfloorasincell');
        var promotionSize = promotionCell.length;
        var asinSize = asinCell.length;
        
        if (lossNumber>0){
            var lossPACell = asinSize*2-(showNumber-1);
            if (lossPACell<0)
                lossPACell = 0;
            var lossPair = Math.floor(lossPACell/2);
            for (var i=0;i<lossPair;i++){
                promotionCell[promotionSize-i-1] && promotionCell[promotionSize-i-1].style && (promotionCell[promotionSize-i-1].style.display = 'none');
                asinCell[asinSize-i-1] && asinCell[asinSize-i-1].style && (asinCell[asinSize-i-1].style.display = 'none');
            }
            if (lossPACell%2==1){
                asinCell[asinSize-lossPair-1] && asinCell[asinSize-lossPair-1].style && (asinCell[asinSize-lossPair-1].style.display='none');
                promotionCell[asinSize-lossPair-1] && promotionCell[asinSize-lossPair-1].style && (promotionCell[asinSize-lossPair-1].style.display='block');
            } else {
                asinCell[asinSize-lossPair-1] && asinCell[asinSize-lossPair-1].style && (asinCell[asinSize-lossPair-1].style.display='block');
                promotionCell[asinSize-lossPair-1] && promotionCell[asinSize-lossPair-1].style && (promotionCell[asinSize-lossPair-1].style.display='block');
            }
            for (var i=0;i<asinSize-lossPair-1;i++){
                asinCell[i] && asinCell[i].style && (asinCell[i].style.display='block');
                promotionCell[i] && promotionCell[i].style && (promotionCell[i].style.display='block');
            }
        } else {
            for (var j=0;j<asinSize;j++){
                asinCell[j] && asinCell[j].style && (asinCell[j].style.display='block');
                promotionCell[j] && promotionCell[j].style && (promotionCell[j].style.display='block');
            }
        }
        
        
    }
}
function SOFTLINERender($){
    $.ajax({
        type: 'POST',
        url: '/gp/grid-floor-widget/ajaxGetGridContent.html/458-5905564-5122958',
        data: {"floorType":"SOFTLINE","rId":"1GTGN01SM21QXNZNQZNY","arrow":"https://images-cn.ssl-images-amazon.com/images/G/28/gwfloor/static/images/arrow_small_white._CB304609528_.png","redirectUrl":"#?pf_rd_p=14fd1035-03b1-43cb-9e50-16cf9d41f686&pf_rd_s=desktop-6&pf_rd_t=36701&pf_rd_i=desktop&pf_rd_m=A1AJ19PSB66TGU&pf_rd_r=1GTGN01SM21QXNZNQZNY&pf_rd_r=1GTGN01SM21QXNZNQZNY&pf_rd_p=14fd1035-03b1-43cb-9e50-16cf9d41f686"},
        dataType: 'text',
        cache: false,
        contentType: 'application/x-www-form-urlencoded; charset=utf-8',
        timeout: 40000,
        success: function(data) {
            data = eval('('+data+')');
            var contentHtml = data.contentHtml;
            $('#SOFTLINEgfloorcontent').append(contentHtml);
            $('#SOFTLINEgfloorcontent .gfloorasincelldiv').css({'opacity':0.85});
            $('#SOFTLINEgfloorcontent .gfloorblockcell').css({'opacity':0.8});
            $('#SOFTLINEgfloorcontent .gfloorasincelldiv').hover(
                function(){
                    $(this).stop(true,true).animate({opacity:0.95},200);
                },
                function(){
                    $(this).stop(true,true).animate({opacity:0.85},200);
                }
            );
            $('#SOFTLINEgfloorcontent .gfloorblockcell').hover(
                function(){
                    $(this).stop(true,true).animate({opacity:0.9},200);
                },
                function(){
                    $(this).stop(true,true).animate({opacity:0.8},200);
                }
            );
            $('#SOFTLINEgfloorcontent .gfloorpromotiontext').hover(
                function(){
                    $(this).find('.gfcontentbspan').css({'color':'#E47911'});
                },
                function(){
                    $(this).find('.gfcontentbspan').css({'color':'#767676'});
                }
            );
            $('#SOFTLINEgfloorcontent .gfloorbstext').hover(
                function(){
                    $(this).find('.gfcontentbspan').css({'color':'#E47911'});
                },
                function(){
                    $(this).find('.gfcontentbspan').css({'color':'#767676'});
                }
            );
            SOFTLINEresize($, $('#SOFTLINEgfloor'),1);
        }
    });
}
if (typeof amznJQ !== 'undefined'){
    amznJQ.available('jQuery',function(){
        var $ = jQuery;
        var thisfloor = $('#SOFTLINEgfloor');
        SOFTLINEcheck($);
        $(window).scroll(function(){
            if (SOFTLINEgfloorstatus == 0){
                SOFTLINEcheck($);
            }
        });
    });
} else if (typeof P !== 'undefined'){
    P.when('A').execute(function(A){
        var $ = A.$;
        var thisfloor = $('#SOFTLINEgfloor');
        SOFTLINEcheck($);
        $(window).scroll(function(){
            if (SOFTLINEgfloorstatus == 0){
                SOFTLINEcheck($);
            }
        });
    });
}
</script>







  </div>
    <hr class='slot-hr desktop-6-hr' />

    
    
  <div class='desktop-row gw-widget-instrument' id='desktop-7'>

&#x7535;&#x8111;</a></li><li style="width:5px;color:#ababab">&bull;</li><li><a href="/b/458-5905564-5122958/ref=gwgfloorv1_CE_Header_3?_encoding=UTF8&ie=UTF8&ie=UTF8&node=2127221051&pf_rd_p=5aab837b-e199-4e2b-b776-ac25d54427da&pf_rd_s=desktop-7&pf_rd_t=36701&pf_rd_i=desktop&pf_rd_m=A1AJ19PSB66TGU&pf_rd_r=1GTGN01SM21QXNZNQZNY&pf_rd_r=1GTGN01SM21QXNZNQZNY&pf_rd_p=5aab837b-e199-4e2b-b776-ac25d54427da"> &#x529e;&#x516c;</a></li></ul></div></div><div class="gfloorContent" id="CEgfloorcontent"></div></div></div>

<script type="text/javascript">
var CEgfloorstatus = 0;
function CEcheck($){
    var windowtop  = $(window).scrollTop();
    var windowfoot = windowtop+$(window).height();
    var preheight  = 400;
    var thisfloor  = $('#CEgfloor');
    var floorheight= 470;
    var floortop   = thisfloor.offset().top;
    var floorfoot  = floortop+floorheight;
    if ((floortop>windowfoot && floortop<windowfoot+preheight) 
        || (floorfoot<windowtop && floorfoot+preheight>windowtop) 
        || (floorfoot>windowtop && floortop<windowfoot)){
            CEgfloorstatus = 1;
            CERender($);
            $(window).resize(function(){
                CEresize($, thisfloor,0);
            });
    }
}
function CEresize($,thisfloor,status){
    var screenwidth = thisfloor.width();
    if (screenwidth>=1470){
        alterfloor(7);
    } else if (screenwidth<1470 && screenwidth>=1260){
        changesize(1470,7);
    } else if (screenwidth<1260 && screenwidth>=1080) {
        changesize(1260,6);
    } else if (screenwidth<1080 && screenwidth>=1040) {
        alterfloor(5);
    } else if (screenwidth<1040 && screenwidth>=900) {
        changesize(1040,5);
    } else if (screenwidth<900 && screenwidth>=840) {
        alterfloor(4);
    } else if (screenwidth<840 && screenwidth>=720) {
        changesize(840,4);
    } else if (screenwidth<720) {
        alterfloor(3);
    }
    function alterfloor(showNumber){
        var floorContent = thisfloor.find('.gfloorContent');
        var header = thisfloor.find('.gfloorHeader');
        var firstline = thisfloor.find('.gfloor-first-line');
        var secondline = thisfloor.find('.gfloor-second-line');
        hidecell(firstline,showNumber);
        hidecell(secondline,showNumber);
        floorContent.width(210*showNumber);
        header.width(210*showNumber);
        thisfloor.find('.gfloorfbrand').css({'margin-top':30});
        thisfloor.find('.gfloorsbrand').css({'margin-top':30});
        firstline.width(210*showNumber);firstline.height(210);
        secondline.width(210*showNumber);secondline.height(210);
        thisfloor.find('.gfloorcell').width(210);
        thisfloor.find('.gfloorcell').height(210);
        thisfloor.find('.gfloorbigprice').css({'font-size':42});
        thisfloor.find('.gfnewContent').css({'font-size':24});
        thisfloor.find('.gfcontentbuy').css({'bottom':40});
    }
    
    function changesize(maxWdith,showNumber){
        var floorContent = thisfloor.find('.gfloorContent');
        var header = thisfloor.find('.gfloorHeader');
        var losswidth = maxWdith - screenwidth;
        var perlosswidth = losswidth / showNumber;
        var firstline = thisfloor.find('.gfloor-first-line');
        var secondline = thisfloor.find('.gfloor-second-line');
        hidecell(firstline,showNumber);
        hidecell(secondline,showNumber);
        var allwidth = 210*showNumber-losswidth
        floorContent.width(allwidth);
        header.width(allwidth);
        thisfloor.find('.gfloorfbrand').css({'margin-top':30-perlosswidth/3});
        thisfloor.find('.gfloorsbrand').css({'margin-top':30-perlosswidth/3});
        firstline.width(allwidth+1);firstline.height(210-perlosswidth);
        secondline.width(allwidth+1);secondline.height(210-perlosswidth);
        thisfloor.find('.gfloorcell').width(210-perlosswidth);
        thisfloor.find('.gfloorcell').height(210-perlosswidth);
        thisfloor.find('.gfloorbigprice').css({'font-size':42-perlosswidth/3});
        thisfloor.find('.gfnewContent').css({'font-size':24-perlosswidth/10});
        thisfloor.find('.gfcontentbuy').css({'bottom':40-perlosswidth/3});
    }
    function hideType(fline, lossNum, typename){
        var hideCell = fline.find(typename);
        var hideSize = hideCell.length;
        if (lossNum>0){
            for (var i=hideSize-1;i>=0;i--){
                hideCell[i].style.display='none';
                lossNum--;
                if (lossNum<=0){
                    for (var j=i-1;j>=0;j--)
                        hideCell[j].style.display='block';
                    break;
                }
            }
        } else {
            for (var j=0;j<hideSize;j++)
                hideCell[j].style.display='block';
        }
        return lossNum;
    }
    function hidecell(fline,showNumber){
        var lossNumber = 7-showNumber;
        lossNumber = hideType(fline,lossNumber, '.gfloorhotword');
        lossNumber = hideType(fline,lossNumber, '.gfloorasinbs');
        
        var promotionCell = fline.find('.gfloorpromotiontext');
        var asinCell = fline.find('.gfloorasincell');
        var promotionSize = promotionCell.length;
        var asinSize = asinCell.length;
        
        if (lossNumber>0){
            var lossPACell = asinSize*2-(showNumber-1);
            if (lossPACell<0)
                lossPACell = 0;
            var lossPair = Math.floor(lossPACell/2);
            for (var i=0;i<lossPair;i++){
                promotionCell[promotionSize-i-1] && promotionCell[promotionSize-i-1].style && (promotionCell[promotionSize-i-1].style.display = 'none');
                asinCell[asinSize-i-1] && asinCell[asinSize-i-1].style && (asinCell[asinSize-i-1].style.display = 'none');
            }
            if (lossPACell%2==1){
                asinCell[asinSize-lossPair-1] && asinCell[asinSize-lossPair-1].style && (asinCell[asinSize-lossPair-1].style.display='none');
                promotionCell[asinSize-lossPair-1] && promotionCell[asinSize-lossPair-1].style && (promotionCell[asinSize-lossPair-1].style.display='block');
            } else {
                asinCell[asinSize-lossPair-1] && asinCell[asinSize-lossPair-1].style && (asinCell[asinSize-lossPair-1].style.display='block');
                promotionCell[asinSize-lossPair-1] && promotionCell[asinSize-lossPair-1].style && (promotionCell[asinSize-lossPair-1].style.display='block');
            }
            for (var i=0;i<asinSize-lossPair-1;i++){
                asinCell[i] && asinCell[i].style && (asinCell[i].style.display='block');
                promotionCell[i] && promotionCell[i].style && (promotionCell[i].style.display='block');
            }
        } else {
            for (var j=0;j<asinSize;j++){
                asinCell[j] && asinCell[j].style && (asinCell[j].style.display='block');
                promotionCell[j] && promotionCell[j].style && (promotionCell[j].style.display='block');
            }
        }
        
        
    }
}
function CERender($){
    $.ajax({
        type: 'POST',
        url: '/gp/grid-floor-widget/ajaxGetGridContent.html/458-5905564-5122958',
        data: {"floorType":"CE","rId":"1GTGN01SM21QXNZNQZNY","arrow":"https://images-cn.ssl-images-amazon.com/images/G/28/gwfloor/static/images/arrow_small_white._CB304609528_.png","redirectUrl":"#?pf_rd_p=5aab837b-e199-4e2b-b776-ac25d54427da&pf_rd_s=desktop-7&pf_rd_t=36701&pf_rd_i=desktop&pf_rd_m=A1AJ19PSB66TGU&pf_rd_r=1GTGN01SM21QXNZNQZNY&pf_rd_r=1GTGN01SM21QXNZNQZNY&pf_rd_p=5aab837b-e199-4e2b-b776-ac25d54427da"},
        dataType: 'text',
        cache: false,
        contentType: 'application/x-www-form-urlencoded; charset=utf-8',
        timeout: 40000,
        success: function(data) {
            data = eval('('+data+')');
            var contentHtml = data.contentHtml;
            $('#CEgfloorcontent').append(contentHtml);
            $('#CEgfloorcontent .gfloorasincelldiv').css({'opacity':0.85});
            $('#CEgfloorcontent .gfloorblockcell').css({'opacity':0.8});
            $('#CEgfloorcontent .gfloorasincelldiv').hover(
                function(){
                    $(this).stop(true,true).animate({opacity:0.95},200);
                },
                function(){
                    $(this).stop(true,true).animate({opacity:0.85},200);
                }
            );
            $('#CEgfloorcontent .gfloorblockcell').hover(
                function(){
                    $(this).stop(true,true).animate({opacity:0.9},200);
                },
                function(){
                    $(this).stop(true,true).animate({opacity:0.8},200);
                }
            );
            $('#CEgfloorcontent .gfloorpromotiontext').hover(
                function(){
                    $(this).find('.gfcontentbspan').css({'color':'#E47911'});
                },
                function(){
                    $(this).find('.gfcontentbspan').css({'color':'#767676'});
                }
            );
            $('#CEgfloorcontent .gfloorbstext').hover(
                function(){
                    $(this).find('.gfcontentbspan').css({'color':'#E47911'});
                },
                function(){
                    $(this).find('.gfcontentbspan').css({'color':'#767676'});
                }
            );
            CEresize($, $('#CEgfloor'),1);
        }
    });
}
if (typeof amznJQ !== 'undefined'){
    amznJQ.available('jQuery',function(){
        var $ = jQuery;
        var thisfloor = $('#CEgfloor');
        CEcheck($);
        $(window).scroll(function(){
            if (CEgfloorstatus == 0){
                CEcheck($);
            }
        });
    });
} else if (typeof P !== 'undefined'){
    P.when('A').execute(function(A){
        var $ = A.$;
        var thisfloor = $('#CEgfloor');
        CEcheck($);
        $(window).scroll(function(){
            if (CEgfloorstatus == 0){
                CEcheck($);
            }
        });
    });
}
</script>







  </div>

    

        
  <div class='desktop-row gw-widget-instrument' id='desktop-8'>

<script type="text/javascript">
var BMVDgfloorstatus = 0;
function BMVDcheck($){
    var windowtop  = $(window).scrollTop();
    var windowfoot = windowtop+$(window).height();
    var preheight  = 400;
    var thisfloor  = $('#BMVDgfloor');
    var floorheight= 470;
    var floortop   = thisfloor.offset().top;
    var floorfoot  = floortop+floorheight;
    if ((floortop>windowfoot && floortop<windowfoot+preheight) 
        || (floorfoot<windowtop && floorfoot+preheight>windowtop) 
        || (floorfoot>windowtop && floortop<windowfoot)){
            BMVDgfloorstatus = 1;
            BMVDRender($);
            $(window).resize(function(){
                BMVDresize($, thisfloor,0);
            });
    }
}
function BMVDresize($,thisfloor,status){
    var screenwidth = thisfloor.width();
    if (screenwidth>=1470){
        alterfloor(7);
    } else if (screenwidth<1470 && screenwidth>=1260){
        changesize(1470,7);
    } else if (screenwidth<1260 && screenwidth>=1080) {
        changesize(1260,6);
    } else if (screenwidth<1080 && screenwidth>=1040) {
        alterfloor(5);
    } else if (screenwidth<1040 && screenwidth>=900) {
        changesize(1040,5);
    } else if (screenwidth<900 && screenwidth>=840) {
        alterfloor(4);
    } else if (screenwidth<840 && screenwidth>=720) {
        changesize(840,4);
    } else if (screenwidth<720) {
        alterfloor(3);
    }
    function alterfloor(showNumber){
        var floorContent = thisfloor.find('.gfloorContent');
        var header = thisfloor.find('.gfloorHeader');
        var firstline = thisfloor.find('.gfloor-first-line');
        var secondline = thisfloor.find('.gfloor-second-line');
        hidecell(firstline,showNumber);
        hidecell(secondline,showNumber);
        floorContent.width(210*showNumber);
        header.width(210*showNumber);
        thisfloor.find('.gfloorfbrand').css({'margin-top':30});
        thisfloor.find('.gfloorsbrand').css({'margin-top':30});
        firstline.width(210*showNumber);firstline.height(210);
        secondline.width(210*showNumber);secondline.height(210);
        thisfloor.find('.gfloorcell').width(210);
        thisfloor.find('.gfloorcell').height(210);
        thisfloor.find('.gfloorbigprice').css({'font-size':42});
        thisfloor.find('.gfnewContent').css({'font-size':24});
        thisfloor.find('.gfcontentbuy').css({'bottom':40});
    }
    
    function changesize(maxWdith,showNumber){
        var floorContent = thisfloor.find('.gfloorContent');
        var header = thisfloor.find('.gfloorHeader');
        var losswidth = maxWdith - screenwidth;
        var perlosswidth = losswidth / showNumber;
        var firstline = thisfloor.find('.gfloor-first-line');
        var secondline = thisfloor.find('.gfloor-second-line');
        hidecell(firstline,showNumber);
        hidecell(secondline,showNumber);
        var allwidth = 210*showNumber-losswidth
        floorContent.width(allwidth);
        header.width(allwidth);
        thisfloor.find('.gfloorfbrand').css({'margin-top':30-perlosswidth/3});
        thisfloor.find('.gfloorsbrand').css({'margin-top':30-perlosswidth/3});
        firstline.width(allwidth+1);firstline.height(210-perlosswidth);
        secondline.width(allwidth+1);secondline.height(210-perlosswidth);
        thisfloor.find('.gfloorcell').width(210-perlosswidth);
        thisfloor.find('.gfloorcell').height(210-perlosswidth);
        thisfloor.find('.gfloorbigprice').css({'font-size':42-perlosswidth/3});
        thisfloor.find('.gfnewContent').css({'font-size':24-perlosswidth/10});
        thisfloor.find('.gfcontentbuy').css({'bottom':40-perlosswidth/3});
    }
    function hideType(fline, lossNum, typename){
        var hideCell = fline.find(typename);
        var hideSize = hideCell.length;
        if (lossNum>0){
            for (var i=hideSize-1;i>=0;i--){
                hideCell[i].style.display='none';
                lossNum--;
                if (lossNum<=0){
                    for (var j=i-1;j>=0;j--)
                        hideCell[j].style.display='block';
                    break;
                }
            }
        } else {
            for (var j=0;j<hideSize;j++)
                hideCell[j].style.display='block';
        }
        return lossNum;
    }
    function hidecell(fline,showNumber){
        var lossNumber = 7-showNumber;
        lossNumber = hideType(fline,lossNumber, '.gfloorhotword');
        lossNumber = hideType(fline,lossNumber, '.gfloorasinbs');
        
        var promotionCell = fline.find('.gfloorpromotiontext');
        var asinCell = fline.find('.gfloorasincell');
        var promotionSize = promotionCell.length;
        var asinSize = asinCell.length;
        
        if (lossNumber>0){
            var lossPACell = asinSize*2-(showNumber-1);
            if (lossPACell<0)
                lossPACell = 0;
            var lossPair = Math.floor(lossPACell/2);
            for (var i=0;i<lossPair;i++){
                promotionCell[promotionSize-i-1] && promotionCell[promotionSize-i-1].style && (promotionCell[promotionSize-i-1].style.display = 'none');
                asinCell[asinSize-i-1] && asinCell[asinSize-i-1].style && (asinCell[asinSize-i-1].style.display = 'none');
            }
            if (lossPACell%2==1){
                asinCell[asinSize-lossPair-1] && asinCell[asinSize-lossPair-1].style && (asinCell[asinSize-lossPair-1].style.display='none');
                promotionCell[asinSize-lossPair-1] && promotionCell[asinSize-lossPair-1].style && (promotionCell[asinSize-lossPair-1].style.display='block');
            } else {
                asinCell[asinSize-lossPair-1] && asinCell[asinSize-lossPair-1].style && (asinCell[asinSize-lossPair-1].style.display='block');
                promotionCell[asinSize-lossPair-1] && promotionCell[asinSize-lossPair-1].style && (promotionCell[asinSize-lossPair-1].style.display='block');
            }
            for (var i=0;i<asinSize-lossPair-1;i++){
                asinCell[i] && asinCell[i].style && (asinCell[i].style.display='block');
                promotionCell[i] && promotionCell[i].style && (promotionCell[i].style.display='block');
            }
        } else {
            for (var j=0;j<asinSize;j++){
                asinCell[j] && asinCell[j].style && (asinCell[j].style.display='block');
                promotionCell[j] && promotionCell[j].style && (promotionCell[j].style.display='block');
            }
        }
        
        
    }
}
function BMVDRender($){
    $.ajax({
        type: 'POST',
        url: '/gp/grid-floor-widget/ajaxGetGridContent.html/458-5905564-5122958',
        data: {"floorType":"BMVD","rId":"1GTGN01SM21QXNZNQZNY","arrow":"https://images-cn.ssl-images-amazon.com/images/G/28/gwfloor/static/images/arrow_small_white._CB304609528_.png","redirectUrl":"#?pf_rd_p=3399e1ca-b03f-4b01-8455-0c17dcc9273a&pf_rd_s=desktop-8&pf_rd_t=36701&pf_rd_i=desktop&pf_rd_m=A1AJ19PSB66TGU&pf_rd_r=1GTGN01SM21QXNZNQZNY&pf_rd_r=1GTGN01SM21QXNZNQZNY&pf_rd_p=3399e1ca-b03f-4b01-8455-0c17dcc9273a"},
        dataType: 'text',
        cache: false,
        contentType: 'application/x-www-form-urlencoded; charset=utf-8',
        timeout: 40000,
        success: function(data) {
            data = eval('('+data+')');
            var contentHtml = data.contentHtml;
            $('#BMVDgfloorcontent').append(contentHtml);
            $('#BMVDgfloorcontent .gfloorasincelldiv').css({'opacity':0.85});
            $('#BMVDgfloorcontent .gfloorblockcell').css({'opacity':0.8});
            $('#BMVDgfloorcontent .gfloorasincelldiv').hover(
                function(){
                    $(this).stop(true,true).animate({opacity:0.95},200);
                },
                function(){
                    $(this).stop(true,true).animate({opacity:0.85},200);
                }
            );
            $('#BMVDgfloorcontent .gfloorblockcell').hover(
                function(){
                    $(this).stop(true,true).animate({opacity:0.9},200);
                },
                function(){
                    $(this).stop(true,true).animate({opacity:0.8},200);
                }
            );
            $('#BMVDgfloorcontent .gfloorpromotiontext').hover(
                function(){
                    $(this).find('.gfcontentbspan').css({'color':'#E47911'});
                },
                function(){
                    $(this).find('.gfcontentbspan').css({'color':'#767676'});
                }
            );
            $('#BMVDgfloorcontent .gfloorbstext').hover(
                function(){
                    $(this).find('.gfcontentbspan').css({'color':'#E47911'});
                },
                function(){
                    $(this).find('.gfcontentbspan').css({'color':'#767676'});
                }
            );
            BMVDresize($, $('#BMVDgfloor'),1);
        }
    });
}
if (typeof amznJQ !== 'undefined'){
    amznJQ.available('jQuery',function(){
        var $ = jQuery;
        var thisfloor = $('#BMVDgfloor');
        BMVDcheck($);
        $(window).scroll(function(){
            if (BMVDgfloorstatus == 0){
                BMVDcheck($);
            }
        });
    });
} else if (typeof P !== 'undefined'){
    P.when('A').execute(function(A){
        var $ = A.$;
        var thisfloor = $('#BMVDgfloor');
        BMVDcheck($);
        $(window).scroll(function(){
            if (BMVDgfloorstatus == 0){
                BMVDcheck($);
            }
        });
    });
}
</script>







  </div>
    <hr class='slot-hr desktop-8-hr' />

<div class="gfloor" id="HARDLINEgfloor"><div class="gfloorHolder"><div class="gfloorHeader"><div class="gfloorTitle"><div class="gfloortitleimg"><img src="https://images-cn.ssl-images-amazon.com/images/G/28/gwfloor/static/images/dy_hardline._CB334700282_.png" style="width:40px;height:40px;"></div><div class="gfloortitlecontent"><span>&#x5c45;&#x5bb6;&#x751f;&#x6d3b;&#x9986;</span></div></div><div class="gfloorHeaderSplit"></div><div class="gfloorHeaderLinks"><ul><li><a href="/b/458-5905564-5122958/ref=gwgfloorv1_HARDLINE_Header_0?_encoding=UTF8&ie=UTF8&ie=UTF8&node=814224051&pf_rd_p=1c6aa682-0743-4963-ba17-82deab2aa56d&pf_rd_s=desktop-10&pf_rd_t=36701&pf_rd_i=desktop&pf_rd_m=A1AJ19PSB66TGU&pf_rd_r=1GTGN01SM21QXNZNQZNY&pf_rd_r=1GTGN01SM21QXNZNQZNY&pf_rd_p=1c6aa682-0743-4963-ba17-82deab2aa56d"> &#x5c0f;&#x5bb6;&#x7535;</a></li><li style="width:5px;color:#ababab">&bull;</li><li><a href="/b/458-5905564-5122958/ref=gwgfloorv1_HARDLINE_Header_2?_encoding=UTF8&ie=UTF8&ie=UTF8&node=1952920051&pf_rd_p=1c6aa682-0743-4963-ba17-82deab2aa56d&pf_rd_s=desktop-10&pf_rd_t=36701&pf_rd_i=desktop&pf_rd_m=A1AJ19PSB66TGU&pf_rd_r=1GTGN01SM21QXNZNQZNY&pf_rd_r=1GTGN01SM21QXNZNQZNY&pf_rd_p=1c6aa682-0743-4963-ba17-82deab2aa56d"> &#x5bb6;&#x88c5;</a></li><li style="width:5px;color:#ababab">&bull;</li><li><a href="/b/458-5905564-5122958/ref=gwgfloorv1_HARDLINE_Header_3?_encoding=UTF8&ie=UTF8&ie=UTF8&node=813108051&pf_rd_p=1c6aa682-0743-4963-ba17-82deab2aa56d&pf_rd_s=desktop-10&pf_rd_t=36701&pf_rd_i=desktop&pf_rd_m=A1AJ19PSB66TGU&pf_rd_r=1GTGN01SM21QXNZNQZNY&pf_rd_r=1GTGN01SM21QXNZNQZNY&pf_rd_p=1c6aa682-0743-4963-ba17-82deab2aa56d"> &#x53a8;&#x5177;</a></li><li style="width:5px;color:#ababab">&bull;</li><li><a href="/b/458-5905564-5122958/ref=gwgfloorv1_HARDLINE_Header_4?_encoding=UTF8&ie=UTF8&ie=UTF8&node=836312051&pf_rd_p=1c6aa682-0743-4963-ba17-82deab2aa56d&pf_rd_s=desktop-10&pf_rd_t=36701&pf_rd_i=desktop&pf_rd_m=A1AJ19PSB66TGU&pf_rd_r=1GTGN01SM21QXNZNQZNY&pf_rd_r=1GTGN01SM21QXNZNQZNY&pf_rd_p=1c6aa682-0743-4963-ba17-82deab2aa56d"> &#x8fd0;&#x52a8;&#x6237;&#x5916;</a></li></ul></div></div><div class="gfloorContent" id="HARDLINEgfloorcontent"></div></div></div>

<script type="text/javascript">
var HARDLINEgfloorstatus = 0;
function HARDLINEcheck($){
    var windowtop  = $(window).scrollTop();
    var windowfoot = windowtop+$(window).height();
    var preheight  = 400;
    var thisfloor  = $('#HARDLINEgfloor');
    var floorheight= 470;
    var floortop   = thisfloor.offset().top;
    var floorfoot  = floortop+floorheight;
    if ((floortop>windowfoot && floortop<windowfoot+preheight) 
        || (floorfoot<windowtop && floorfoot+preheight>windowtop) 
        || (floorfoot>windowtop && floortop<windowfoot)){
            HARDLINEgfloorstatus = 1;
            HARDLINERender($);
            $(window).resize(function(){
                HARDLINEresize($, thisfloor,0);
            });
    }
}
function HARDLINEresize($,thisfloor,status){
    var screenwidth = thisfloor.width();
    if (screenwidth>=1470){
        alterfloor(7);
    } else if (screenwidth<1470 && screenwidth>=1260){
        changesize(1470,7);
    } else if (screenwidth<1260 && screenwidth>=1080) {
        changesize(1260,6);
    } else if (screenwidth<1080 && screenwidth>=1040) {
        alterfloor(5);
    } else if (screenwidth<1040 && screenwidth>=900) {
        changesize(1040,5);
    } else if (screenwidth<900 && screenwidth>=840) {
        alterfloor(4);
    } else if (screenwidth<840 && screenwidth>=720) {
        changesize(840,4);
    } else if (screenwidth<720) {
        alterfloor(3);
    }
    function alterfloor(showNumber){
        var floorContent = thisfloor.find('.gfloorContent');
        var header = thisfloor.find('.gfloorHeader');
        var firstline = thisfloor.find('.gfloor-first-line');
        var secondline = thisfloor.find('.gfloor-second-line');
        hidecell(firstline,showNumber);
        hidecell(secondline,showNumber);
        floorContent.width(210*showNumber);
        header.width(210*showNumber);
        thisfloor.find('.gfloorfbrand').css({'margin-top':30});
        thisfloor.find('.gfloorsbrand').css({'margin-top':30});
        firstline.width(210*showNumber);firstline.height(210);
        secondline.width(210*showNumber);secondline.height(210);
        thisfloor.find('.gfloorcell').width(210);
        thisfloor.find('.gfloorcell').height(210);
        thisfloor.find('.gfloorbigprice').css({'font-size':42});
        thisfloor.find('.gfnewContent').css({'font-size':24});
        thisfloor.find('.gfcontentbuy').css({'bottom':40});
    }
    
    function changesize(maxWdith,showNumber){
        var floorContent = thisfloor.find('.gfloorContent');
        var header = thisfloor.find('.gfloorHeader');
        var losswidth = maxWdith - screenwidth;
        var perlosswidth = losswidth / showNumber;
        var firstline = thisfloor.find('.gfloor-first-line');
        var secondline = thisfloor.find('.gfloor-second-line');
        hidecell(firstline,showNumber);
        hidecell(secondline,showNumber);
        var allwidth = 210*showNumber-losswidth
        floorContent.width(allwidth);
        header.width(allwidth);
        thisfloor.find('.gfloorfbrand').css({'margin-top':30-perlosswidth/3});
        thisfloor.find('.gfloorsbrand').css({'margin-top':30-perlosswidth/3});
        firstline.width(allwidth+1);firstline.height(210-perlosswidth);
        secondline.width(allwidth+1);secondline.height(210-perlosswidth);
        thisfloor.find('.gfloorcell').width(210-perlosswidth);
        thisfloor.find('.gfloorcell').height(210-perlosswidth);
        thisfloor.find('.gfloorbigprice').css({'font-size':42-perlosswidth/3});
        thisfloor.find('.gfnewContent').css({'font-size':24-perlosswidth/10});
        thisfloor.find('.gfcontentbuy').css({'bottom':40-perlosswidth/3});
    }
    function hideType(fline, lossNum, typename){
        var hideCell = fline.find(typename);
        var hideSize = hideCell.length;
        if (lossNum>0){
            for (var i=hideSize-1;i>=0;i--){
                hideCell[i].style.display='none';
                lossNum--;
                if (lossNum<=0){
                    for (var j=i-1;j>=0;j--)
                        hideCell[j].style.display='block';
                    break;
                }
            }
        } else {
            for (var j=0;j<hideSize;j++)
                hideCell[j].style.display='block';
        }
        return lossNum;
    }
    function hidecell(fline,showNumber){
        var lossNumber = 7-showNumber;
        lossNumber = hideType(fline,lossNumber, '.gfloorhotword');
        lossNumber = hideType(fline,lossNumber, '.gfloorasinbs');
        
        var promotionCell = fline.find('.gfloorpromotiontext');
        var asinCell = fline.find('.gfloorasincell');
        var promotionSize = promotionCell.length;
        var asinSize = asinCell.length;
        
        if (lossNumber>0){
            var lossPACell = asinSize*2-(showNumber-1);
            if (lossPACell<0)
                lossPACell = 0;
            var lossPair = Math.floor(lossPACell/2);
            for (var i=0;i<lossPair;i++){
                promotionCell[promotionSize-i-1] && promotionCell[promotionSize-i-1].style && (promotionCell[promotionSize-i-1].style.display = 'none');
                asinCell[asinSize-i-1] && asinCell[asinSize-i-1].style && (asinCell[asinSize-i-1].style.display = 'none');
            }
            if (lossPACell%2==1){
                asinCell[asinSize-lossPair-1] && asinCell[asinSize-lossPair-1].style && (asinCell[asinSize-lossPair-1].style.display='none');
                promotionCell[asinSize-lossPair-1] && promotionCell[asinSize-lossPair-1].style && (promotionCell[asinSize-lossPair-1].style.display='block');
            } else {
                asinCell[asinSize-lossPair-1] && asinCell[asinSize-lossPair-1].style && (asinCell[asinSize-lossPair-1].style.display='block');
                promotionCell[asinSize-lossPair-1] && promotionCell[asinSize-lossPair-1].style && (promotionCell[asinSize-lossPair-1].style.display='block');
            }
            for (var i=0;i<asinSize-lossPair-1;i++){
                asinCell[i] && asinCell[i].style && (asinCell[i].style.display='block');
                promotionCell[i] && promotionCell[i].style && (promotionCell[i].style.display='block');
            }
        } else {
            for (var j=0;j<asinSize;j++){
                asinCell[j] && asinCell[j].style && (asinCell[j].style.display='block');
                promotionCell[j] && promotionCell[j].style && (promotionCell[j].style.display='block');
            }
        }
        
        
    }
}
function HARDLINERender($){
    $.ajax({
        type: 'POST',
        url: '/gp/grid-floor-widget/ajaxGetGridContent.html/458-5905564-5122958',
        data: {"floorType":"HARDLINE","rId":"1GTGN01SM21QXNZNQZNY","arrow":"https://images-cn.ssl-images-amazon.com/images/G/28/gwfloor/static/images/arrow_small_white._CB304609528_.png","redirectUrl":"#?pf_rd_p=1c6aa682-0743-4963-ba17-82deab2aa56d&pf_rd_s=desktop-10&pf_rd_t=36701&pf_rd_i=desktop&pf_rd_m=A1AJ19PSB66TGU&pf_rd_r=1GTGN01SM21QXNZNQZNY&pf_rd_r=1GTGN01SM21QXNZNQZNY&pf_rd_p=1c6aa682-0743-4963-ba17-82deab2aa56d"},
        dataType: 'text',
        cache: false,
        contentType: 'application/x-www-form-urlencoded; charset=utf-8',
        timeout: 40000,
        success: function(data) {
            data = eval('('+data+')');
            var contentHtml = data.contentHtml;
            $('#HARDLINEgfloorcontent').append(contentHtml);
            $('#HARDLINEgfloorcontent .gfloorasincelldiv').css({'opacity':0.85});
            $('#HARDLINEgfloorcontent .gfloorblockcell').css({'opacity':0.8});
            $('#HARDLINEgfloorcontent .gfloorasincelldiv').hover(
                function(){
                    $(this).stop(true,true).animate({opacity:0.95},200);
                },
                function(){
                    $(this).stop(true,true).animate({opacity:0.85},200);
                }
            );
            $('#HARDLINEgfloorcontent .gfloorblockcell').hover(
                function(){
                    $(this).stop(true,true).animate({opacity:0.9},200);
                },
                function(){
                    $(this).stop(true,true).animate({opacity:0.8},200);
                }
            );
            $('#HARDLINEgfloorcontent .gfloorpromotiontext').hover(
                function(){
                    $(this).find('.gfcontentbspan').css({'color':'#E47911'});
                },
                function(){
                    $(this).find('.gfcontentbspan').css({'color':'#767676'});
                }
            );
            $('#HARDLINEgfloorcontent .gfloorbstext').hover(
                function(){
                    $(this).find('.gfcontentbspan').css({'color':'#E47911'});
                },
                function(){
                    $(this).find('.gfcontentbspan').css({'color':'#767676'});
                }
            );
            HARDLINEresize($, $('#HARDLINEgfloor'),1);
        }
    });
}
if (typeof amznJQ !== 'undefined'){
    amznJQ.available('jQuery',function(){
        var $ = jQuery;
        var thisfloor = $('#HARDLINEgfloor');
        HARDLINEcheck($);
        $(window).scroll(function(){
            if (HARDLINEgfloorstatus == 0){
                HARDLINEcheck($);
            }
        });
    });
} else if (typeof P !== 'undefined'){
    P.when('A').execute(function(A){
        var $ = A.$;
        var thisfloor = $('#HARDLINEgfloor');
        HARDLINEcheck($);
        $(window).scroll(function(){
            if (HARDLINEgfloorstatus == 0){
                HARDLINEcheck($);
            }
        });
    });
}
</script>







  </div>
    <hr class='slot-hr desktop-10-hr' />

        
  <div class='desktop-row gw-widget-instrument' id='desktop-11'>
    






<style>

.gfloorpromotiontext a:hover,.gfloorpromotiona:link,.gfloorpromotion a:visited,.gfloorpromotion a{text-decoration:none;}
.gfloorasincelldiv {height:100%;background-color:white;opacity:0.85;}
.gfloorblockcell {height:100%;background-color:white;opacity:0.8;}
.gfloorbsbadge,.gfloornrbadge {left:5px;z-index:1;position:absolute;text-align:center;width:20px;height:100%;}
<!--.gfloorbsbadge ul{color:#E67A00;}
.gfloornrbadge ul{color:#63AB4C;}-->
.gfloorbsbadge ul,.gfloornrbadge ul{color:#333;font-family:Microsoft Yahei;font-weight:bold;font-size:15px;top:40px;position:relative;vertical-align:middle;width:19px;list-style-type:none;margin:0px;padding:0px;display:inline-block;}
.gfloorbsbadge ul li,.gfloornrbadge ul li {overflow:hidden;height:18px;width:20px;margin:0px;}
.gfloorbrand ul,.gfloorkeyword ul,.gfloortextlink ul{width:80px;list-style-type:none;margin:0px;padding:0px;display:inline-block;}
.gfloorbrand ul li,.gfloorkeyword ul li,.gfloortextlink ul li {overflow:hidden;height:20px;width:75px;margin:0px;}
.gfloorkeyword a,.gfloorbrand a{font-family: CN Hiragino SansGB, Microsoft Yahei, Heiti,sans-serif EN Helvetica,Arial,sans-serif;font-size:14px;color:#767676;}
.gfloorkeyword a:hover,.gfloorkeyword a:active,.gfloorbrand a:hover,.gfloorbrand a:active {color:#fc9900;text-decoration:none;}
.gfloorarrow {position:absolute;z-index:1;top:45%;width:0px;height:0px;border-top:10px solid rgba(0,0,0,0);border-bottom: 10px solid rgba(0, 0, 0, 0);border-left: 10px solid #008000;}
</style>


<div class="gfloor" id="WINEgfloor"><div class="gfloorHolder"><div class="gfloorHeader"><div class="gfloorTitle"><div class="gfloortitleimg"><img src="https://images-cn.ssl-images-amazon.com/images/G/28/gwfloor/static/images/dy_wine._CB301809097_.png" style="width:40px;height:40px;"></div><div class="gfloortitlecontent"><span>&#x7f8e;&#x98df;&#x7f8e;&#x9152;&#x9986;</span></div></div><div class="gfloorHeaderSplit"></div><div class="gfloorHeaderLinks"><ul><li><a href="/b/458-5905564-5122958/ref=gwgfloorv1_WINE_Header_0?_encoding=UTF8&ie=UTF8&ie=UTF8&node=2127215051&pf_rd_p=1bb09b3e-26f5-469a-b965-d011db76b807&pf_rd_s=desktop-11&pf_rd_t=36701&pf_rd_i=desktop&pf_rd_m=A1AJ19PSB66TGU&pf_rd_r=1GTGN01SM21QXNZNQZNY&pf_rd_r=1GTGN01SM21QXNZNQZNY&pf_rd_p=1bb09b3e-26f5-469a-b965-d011db76b807"> &#x98df;&#x54c1;</a></li><li style="width:5px;color:#ababab">&bull;</li><li><a href="/b/458-5905564-5122958/ref=gwgfloorv1_WINE_Header_1?_encoding=UTF8&ie=UTF8&ie=UTF8&node=43234071&pf_rd_p=1bb09b3e-26f5-469a-b965-d011db76b807&pf_rd_s=desktop-11&pf_rd_t=36701&pf_rd_i=desktop&pf_rd_m=A1AJ19PSB66TGU&pf_rd_r=1GTGN01SM21QXNZNQZNY&pf_rd_r=1GTGN01SM21QXNZNQZNY&pf_rd_p=1bb09b3e-26f5-469a-b965-d011db76b807"> &#x9152;&#x6c34;</a></li><li style="width:5px;color:#ababab">&bull;</li><li><a href="/b/458-5905564-5122958/ref=gwgfloorv1_WINE_Header_2?_encoding=UTF8&ie=UTF8&ie=UTF8&node=160229071&pf_rd_p=1bb09b3e-26f5-469a-b965-d011db76b807&pf_rd_s=desktop-11&pf_rd_t=36701&pf_rd_i=desktop&pf_rd_m=A1AJ19PSB66TGU&pf_rd_r=1GTGN01SM21QXNZNQZNY&pf_rd_r=1GTGN01SM21QXNZNQZNY&pf_rd_p=1bb09b3e-26f5-469a-b965-d011db76b807"> &#x751f;&#x9c9c;</a></li><li style="width:5px;color:#ababab">&bull;</li><li><a href="/b/458-5905564-5122958/ref=gwgfloorv1_WINE_Header_3?_encoding=UTF8&ie=UTF8&ie=UTF8&node=1449105071&pf_rd_p=1bb09b3e-26f5-469a-b965-d011db76b807&pf_rd_s=desktop-11&pf_rd_t=36701&pf_rd_i=desktop&pf_rd_m=A1AJ19PSB66TGU&pf_rd_r=1GTGN01SM21QXNZNQZNY&pf_rd_r=1GTGN01SM21QXNZNQZNY&pf_rd_p=1bb09b3e-26f5-469a-b965-d011db76b807"> &#x8fdb;&#x53e3;&#x76f4;&#x91c7;</a></li></ul></div></div><div class="gfloorContent" id="WINEgfloorcontent"></div></div></div>

<script type="text/javascript">
var WINEgfloorstatus = 0;
function WINEcheck($){
    var windowtop  = $(window).scrollTop();
    var windowfoot = windowtop+$(window).height();
    var preheight  = 400;
    var thisfloor  = $('#WINEgfloor');
    var floorheight= 470;
    var floortop   = thisfloor.offset().top;
    var floorfoot  = floortop+floorheight;
    if ((floortop>windowfoot && floortop<windowfoot+preheight) 
        || (floorfoot<windowtop && floorfoot+preheight>windowtop) 
        || (floorfoot>windowtop && floortop<windowfoot)){
            WINEgfloorstatus = 1;
            WINERender($);
            $(window).resize(function(){
                WINEresize($, thisfloor,0);
            });
    }
}
function WINEresize($,thisfloor,status){
    var screenwidth = thisfloor.width();
    if (screenwidth>=1470){
        alterfloor(7);
    } else if (screenwidth<1470 && screenwidth>=1260){
        changesize(1470,7);
    } else if (screenwidth<1260 && screenwidth>=1080) {
        changesize(1260,6);
    } else if (screenwidth<1080 && screenwidth>=1040) {
        alterfloor(5);
    } else if (screenwidth<1040 && screenwidth>=900) {
        changesize(1040,5);
    } else if (screenwidth<900 && screenwidth>=840) {
        alterfloor(4);
    } else if (screenwidth<840 && screenwidth>=720) {
        changesize(840,4);
    } else if (screenwidth<720) {
        alterfloor(3);
    }
    function alterfloor(showNumber){
        var floorContent = thisfloor.find('.gfloorContent');
        var header = thisfloor.find('.gfloorHeader');
        var firstline = thisfloor.find('.gfloor-first-line');
        var secondline = thisfloor.find('.gfloor-second-line');
        hidecell(firstline,showNumber);
        hidecell(secondline,showNumber);
        floorContent.width(210*showNumber);
        header.width(210*showNumber);
        thisfloor.find('.gfloorfbrand').css({'margin-top':30});
        thisfloor.find('.gfloorsbrand').css({'margin-top':30});
        firstline.width(210*showNumber);firstline.height(210);
        secondline.width(210*showNumber);secondline.height(210);
        thisfloor.find('.gfloorcell').width(210);
        thisfloor.find('.gfloorcell').height(210);
        thisfloor.find('.gfloorbigprice').css({'font-size':42});
        thisfloor.find('.gfnewContent').css({'font-size':24});
        thisfloor.find('.gfcontentbuy').css({'bottom':40});
    }
    
    function changesize(maxWdith,showNumber){
        var floorContent = thisfloor.find('.gfloorContent');
        var header = thisfloor.find('.gfloorHeader');
        var losswidth = maxWdith - screenwidth;
        var perlosswidth = losswidth / showNumber;
        var firstline = thisfloor.find('.gfloor-first-line');
        var secondline = thisfloor.find('.gfloor-second-line');
        hidecell(firstline,showNumber);
        hidecell(secondline,showNumber);
        var allwidth = 210*showNumber-losswidth
        floorContent.width(allwidth);
        header.width(allwidth);
        thisfloor.find('.gfloorfbrand').css({'margin-top':30-perlosswidth/3});
        thisfloor.find('.gfloorsbrand').css({'margin-top':30-perlosswidth/3});
        firstline.width(allwidth+1);firstline.height(210-perlosswidth);
        secondline.width(allwidth+1);secondline.height(210-perlosswidth);
        thisfloor.find('.gfloorcell').width(210-perlosswidth);
        thisfloor.find('.gfloorcell').height(210-perlosswidth);
        thisfloor.find('.gfloorbigprice').css({'font-size':42-perlosswidth/3});
        thisfloor.find('.gfnewContent').css({'font-size':24-perlosswidth/10});
        thisfloor.find('.gfcontentbuy').css({'bottom':40-perlosswidth/3});
    }
    function hideType(fline, lossNum, typename){
        var hideCell = fline.find(typename);
        var hideSize = hideCell.length;
        if (lossNum>0){
            for (var i=hideSize-1;i>=0;i--){
                hideCell[i].style.display='none';
                lossNum--;
                if (lossNum<=0){
                    for (var j=i-1;j>=0;j--)
                        hideCell[j].style.display='block';
                    break;
                }
            }
        } else {
            for (var j=0;j<hideSize;j++)
                hideCell[j].style.display='block';
        }
        return lossNum;
    }
    function hidecell(fline,showNumber){
        var lossNumber = 7-showNumber;
        lossNumber = hideType(fline,lossNumber, '.gfloorhotword');
        lossNumber = hideType(fline,lossNumber, '.gfloorasinbs');
        
        var promotionCell = fline.find('.gfloorpromotiontext');
        var asinCell = fline.find('.gfloorasincell');
        var promotionSize = promotionCell.length;
        var asinSize = asinCell.length;
        
        if (lossNumber>0){
            var lossPACell = asinSize*2-(showNumber-1);
            if (lossPACell<0)
                lossPACell = 0;
            var lossPair = Math.floor(lossPACell/2);
            for (var i=0;i<lossPair;i++){
                promotionCell[promotionSize-i-1] && promotionCell[promotionSize-i-1].style && (promotionCell[promotionSize-i-1].style.display = 'none');
                asinCell[asinSize-i-1] && asinCell[asinSize-i-1].style && (asinCell[asinSize-i-1].style.display = 'none');
            }
            if (lossPACell%2==1){
                asinCell[asinSize-lossPair-1] && asinCell[asinSize-lossPair-1].style && (asinCell[asinSize-lossPair-1].style.display='none');
                promotionCell[asinSize-lossPair-1] && promotionCell[asinSize-lossPair-1].style && (promotionCell[asinSize-lossPair-1].style.display='block');
            } else {
                asinCell[asinSize-lossPair-1] && asinCell[asinSize-lossPair-1].style && (asinCell[asinSize-lossPair-1].style.display='block');
                promotionCell[asinSize-lossPair-1] && promotionCell[asinSize-lossPair-1].style && (promotionCell[asinSize-lossPair-1].style.display='block');
            }
            for (var i=0;i<asinSize-lossPair-1;i++){
                asinCell[i] && asinCell[i].style && (asinCell[i].style.display='block');
                promotionCell[i] && promotionCell[i].style && (promotionCell[i].style.display='block');
            }
        } else {
            for (var j=0;j<asinSize;j++){
                asinCell[j] && asinCell[j].style && (asinCell[j].style.display='block');
                promotionCell[j] && promotionCell[j].style && (promotionCell[j].style.display='block');
            }
        }
        
        
    }
}
function WINERender($){
    $.ajax({
        type: 'POST',
        url: '/gp/grid-floor-widget/ajaxGetGridContent.html/458-5905564-5122958',
        data: {"floorType":"WINE","rId":"1GTGN01SM21QXNZNQZNY","arrow":"https://images-cn.ssl-images-amazon.com/images/G/28/gwfloor/static/images/arrow_small_white._CB304609528_.png","redirectUrl":"#?pf_rd_p=1bb09b3e-26f5-469a-b965-d011db76b807&pf_rd_s=desktop-11&pf_rd_t=36701&pf_rd_i=desktop&pf_rd_m=A1AJ19PSB66TGU&pf_rd_r=1GTGN01SM21QXNZNQZNY&pf_rd_r=1GTGN01SM21QXNZNQZNY&pf_rd_p=1bb09b3e-26f5-469a-b965-d011db76b807"},
        dataType: 'text',
        cache: false,
        contentType: 'application/x-www-form-urlencoded; charset=utf-8',
        timeout: 40000,
        success: function(data) {
            data = eval('('+data+')');
            var contentHtml = data.contentHtml;
            $('#WINEgfloorcontent').append(contentHtml);
            $('#WINEgfloorcontent .gfloorasincelldiv').css({'opacity':0.85});
            $('#WINEgfloorcontent .gfloorblockcell').css({'opacity':0.8});
            $('#WINEgfloorcontent .gfloorasincelldiv').hover(
                function(){
                    $(this).stop(true,true).animate({opacity:0.95},200);
                },
                function(){
                    $(this).stop(true,true).animate({opacity:0.85},200);
                }
            );
            $('#WINEgfloorcontent .gfloorblockcell').hover(
                function(){
                    $(this).stop(true,true).animate({opacity:0.9},200);
                },
                function(){
                    $(this).stop(true,true).animate({opacity:0.8},200);
                }
            );
            $('#WINEgfloorcontent .gfloorpromotiontext').hover(
                function(){
                    $(this).find('.gfcontentbspan').css({'color':'#E47911'});
                },
                function(){
                    $(this).find('.gfcontentbspan').css({'color':'#767676'});
                }
            );
            $('#WINEgfloorcontent .gfloorbstext').hover(
                function(){
                    $(this).find('.gfcontentbspan').css({'color':'#E47911'});
                },
                function(){
                    $(this).find('.gfcontentbspan').css({'color':'#767676'});
                }
            );
            WINEresize($, $('#WINEgfloor'),1);
        }
    });
}
if (typeof amznJQ !== 'undefined'){
    amznJQ.available('jQuery',function(){
        var $ = jQuery;
        var thisfloor = $('#WINEgfloor');
        WINEcheck($);
        $(window).scroll(function(){
            if (WINEgfloorstatus == 0){
                WINEcheck($);
            }
        });
    });
} else if (typeof P !== 'undefined'){
    P.when('A').execute(function(A){
        var $ = A.$;
        var thisfloor = $('#WINEgfloor');
        WINEcheck($);
        $(window).scroll(function(){
            if (WINEgfloorstatus == 0){
                WINEcheck($);
            }
        });
    });
}
</script>







  </div>
    <hr class='slot-hr desktop-11-hr' />

        
  <div class='desktop-row gw-widget-instrument' id='desktop-12'>
