&#x5bb6;&#x5ead;&#x9986;</a></li></ul></div></div><div class="gfloorContent" id="BABYgfloorcontent"></div></div></div>

<script type="text/javascript">
var BABYgfloorstatus = 0;
function BABYcheck($){
    var windowtop  = $(window).scrollTop();
    var windowfoot = windowtop+$(window).height();
    var preheight  = 400;
    var thisfloor  = $('#BABYgfloor');
    var floorheight= 470;
    var floortop   = thisfloor.offset().top;
    var floorfoot  = floortop+floorheight;
    if ((floortop>windowfoot && floortop<windowfoot+preheight) 
        || (floorfoot<windowtop && floorfoot+preheight>windowtop) 
        || (floorfoot>windowtop && floortop<windowfoot)){
            BABYgfloorstatus = 1;
            BABYRender($);
            $(window).resize(function(){
                BABYresize($, thisfloor,0);
            });
    }
}
function BABYresize($,thisfloor,status){
    var screenwidth = thisfloor.width();
    if (screenwidth>=1470){
        alterfloor(7);
    } else if (screenwidth<1470 && screenwidth>=1260){
        changesize(1470,7);
    } else if (screenwidth<1260 && screenwidth>=1080) {
        changesize(1260,6);
    } else if (screenwidth<1080 && screenwidth>=1040) {
        alterfloor(5);
    } else if (screenwidth<1040 && screenwidth>=900) {
        changesize(1040,5);
    } else if (screenwidth<900 && screenwidth>=840) {
        alterfloor(4);
    } else if (screenwidth<840 && screenwidth>=720) {
        changesize(840,4);
    } else if (screenwidth<720) {
        alterfloor(3);
    }
    function alterfloor(showNumber){
        var floorContent = thisfloor.find('.gfloorContent');
        var header = thisfloor.find('.gfloorHeader');
        var firstline = thisfloor.find('.gfloor-first-line');
        var secondline = thisfloor.find('.gfloor-second-line');
        hidecell(firstline,showNumber);
        hidecell(secondline,showNumber);
        floorContent.width(210*showNumber);
        header.width(210*showNumber);
        thisfloor.find('.gfloorfbrand').css({'margin-top':30});
        thisfloor.find('.gfloorsbrand').css({'margin-top':30});
        firstline.width(210*showNumber);firstline.height(210);
        secondline.width(210*showNumber);secondline.height(210);
        thisfloor.find('.gfloorcell').width(210);
        thisfloor.find('.gfloorcell').height(210);
        thisfloor.find('.gfloorbigprice').css({'font-size':42});
        thisfloor.find('.gfnewContent').css({'font-size':24});
        thisfloor.find('.gfcontentbuy').css({'bottom':40});
    }
    
    function changesize(maxWdith,showNumber){
        var floorContent = thisfloor.find('.gfloorContent');
        var header = thisfloor.find('.gfloorHeader');
        var losswidth = maxWdith - screenwidth;
        var perlosswidth = losswidth / showNumber;
        var firstline = thisfloor.find('.gfloor-first-line');
        var secondline = thisfloor.find('.gfloor-second-line');
        hidecell(firstline,showNumber);
        hidecell(secondline,showNumber);
        var allwidth = 210*showNumber-losswidth
        floorContent.width(allwidth);
        header.width(allwidth);
        thisfloor.find('.gfloorfbrand').css({'margin-top':30-perlosswidth/3});
        thisfloor.find('.gfloorsbrand').css({'margin-top':30-perlosswidth/3});
        firstline.width(allwidth+1);firstline.height(210-perlosswidth);
        secondline.width(allwidth+1);secondline.height(210-perlosswidth);
        thisfloor.find('.gfloorcell').width(210-perlosswidth);
        thisfloor.find('.gfloorcell').height(210-perlosswidth);
        thisfloor.find('.gfloorbigprice').css({'font-size':42-perlosswidth/3});
        thisfloor.find('.gfnewContent').css({'font-size':24-perlosswidth/10});
        thisfloor.find('.gfcontentbuy').css({'bottom':40-perlosswidth/3});
    }
    function hideType(fline, lossNum, typename){
        var hideCell = fline.find(typename);
        var hideSize = hideCell.length;
        if (lossNum>0){
            for (var i=hideSize-1;i>=0;i--){
                hideCell[i].style.display='none';
                lossNum--;
                if (lossNum<=0){
                    for (var j=i-1;j>=0;j--)
                        hideCell[j].style.display='block';
                    break;
                }
            }
        } else {
            for (var j=0;j<hideSize;j++)
                hideCell[j].style.display='block';
        }
        return lossNum;
    }
    function hidecell(fline,showNumber){
        var lossNumber = 7-showNumber;
        lossNumber = hideType(fline,lossNumber, '.gfloorhotword');
        lossNumber = hideType(fline,lossNumber, '.gfloorasinbs');
        
        var promotionCell = fline.find('.gfloorpromotiontext');
        var asinCell = fline.find('.gfloorasincell');
        var promotionSize = promotionCell.length;
        var asinSize = asinCell.length;
        
        if (lossNumber>0){
            var lossPACell = asinSize*2-(showNumber-1);
            if (lossPACell<0)
                lossPACell = 0;
            var lossPair = Math.floor(lossPACell/2);
            for (var i=0;i<lossPair;i++){
                promotionCell[promotionSize-i-1] && promotionCell[promotionSize-i-1].style && (promotionCell[promotionSize-i-1].style.display = 'none');
                asinCell[asinSize-i-1] && asinCell[asinSize-i-1].style && (asinCell[asinSize-i-1].style.display = 'none');
            }
            if (lossPACell%2==1){
                asinCell[asinSize-lossPair-1] && asinCell[asinSize-lossPair-1].style && (asinCell[asinSize-lossPair-1].style.display='none');
                promotionCell[asinSize-lossPair-1] && promotionCell[asinSize-lossPair-1].style && (promotionCell[asinSize-lossPair-1].style.display='block');
            } else {
                asinCell[asinSize-lossPair-1] && asinCell[asinSize-lossPair-1].style && (asinCell[asinSize-lossPair-1].style.display='block');
                promotionCell[asinSize-lossPair-1] && promotionCell[asinSize-lossPair-1].style && (promotionCell[asinSize-lossPair-1].style.display='block');
            }
            for (var i=0;i<asinSize-lossPair-1;i++){
                asinCell[i] && asinCell[i].style && (asinCell[i].style.display='block');
                promotionCell[i] && promotionCell[i].style && (promotionCell[i].style.display='block');
            }
        } else {
            for (var j=0;j<asinSize;j++){
                asinCell[j] && asinCell[j].style && (asinCell[j].style.display='block');
                promotionCell[j] && promotionCell[j].style && (promotionCell[j].style.display='block');
            }
        }
        
        
    }
}
function BABYRender($){
    $.ajax({
        type: 'POST',
        url: '/gp/grid-floor-widget/ajaxGetGridContent.html/458-5905564-5122958',
        data: {"floorType":"BABY","rId":"1GTGN01SM21QXNZNQZNY","arrow":"https://images-cn.ssl-images-amazon.com/images/G/28/gwfloor/static/images/arrow_small_white._CB304609528_.png","redirectUrl":"#?pf_rd_p=92fb9cbf-6d2b-405f-b775-18e1b0068fcd&pf_rd_s=desktop-12&pf_rd_t=36701&pf_rd_i=desktop&pf_rd_m=A1AJ19PSB66TGU&pf_rd_r=1GTGN01SM21QXNZNQZNY&pf_rd_r=1GTGN01SM21QXNZNQZNY&pf_rd_p=92fb9cbf-6d2b-405f-b775-18e1b0068fcd"},
        dataType: 'text',
        cache: false,
        contentType: 'application/x-www-form-urlencoded; charset=utf-8',
        timeout: 40000,
        success: function(data) {
            data = eval('('+data+')');
            var contentHtml = data.contentHtml;
            $('#BABYgfloorcontent').append(contentHtml);
            $('#BABYgfloorcontent .gfloorasincelldiv').css({'opacity':0.85});
            $('#BABYgfloorcontent .gfloorblockcell').css({'opacity':0.8});
            $('#BABYgfloorcontent .gfloorasincelldiv').hover(
                function(){
                    $(this).stop(true,true).animate({opacity:0.95},200);
                },
                function(){
                    $(this).stop(true,true).animate({opacity:0.85},200);
                }
            );
            $('#BABYgfloorcontent .gfloorblockcell').hover(
                function(){
                    $(this).stop(true,true).animate({opacity:0.9},200);
                },
                function(){
                    $(this).stop(true,true).animate({opacity:0.8},200);
                }
            );
            $('#BABYgfloorcontent .gfloorpromotiontext').hover(
                function(){
                    $(this).find('.gfcontentbspan').css({'color':'#E47911'});
                },
                function(){
                    $(this).find('.gfcontentbspan').css({'color':'#767676'});
                }
            );
            $('#BABYgfloorcontent .gfloorbstext').hover(
                function(){
                    $(this).find('.gfcontentbspan').css({'color':'#E47911'});
                },
                function(){
                    $(this).find('.gfcontentbspan').css({'color':'#767676'});
                }
            );
            BABYresize($, $('#BABYgfloor'),1);
        }
    });
}
if (typeof amznJQ !== 'undefined'){
    amznJQ.available('jQuery',function(){
        var $ = jQuery;
        var thisfloor = $('#BABYgfloor');
        BABYcheck($);
        $(window).scroll(function(){
            if (BABYgfloorstatus == 0){
                BABYcheck($);
            }
        });
    });
} else if (typeof P !== 'undefined'){
    P.when('A').execute(function(A){
        var $ = A.$;
        var thisfloor = $('#BABYgfloor');
        BABYcheck($);
        $(window).scroll(function(){
            if (BABYgfloorstatus == 0){
                BABYcheck($);
            }
        });
    });
}
</script>

    <hr class='slot-hr desktop-12-hr' />

        



  </div>

<div class="cn-right-trail-banner">    <div class="cn-right-trail-banner-holder">    </div></div>

<script type="text/javascript">

function CNRightTrailBanner($){

  var status=0;

  var bannerBackgroundColorArray = 
  ['#D8AE5A',
   '#C6C6C2',
   '#9CC9AB',
   '#5BABC3',
   '#CEC55C',
   '#89D793']; 
  
  function Render(){
      $.ajax({
          type: 'POST',
          url: '/gp/cn-right-trail-banner/ajaxGetRightTrailBannerContentHtmlV2.html/458-5905564-5122958',
          data: {"promotionFilter":"%5B%22A2ERXUNM5V6OO5%22%2C%22A244O14TINE2H4%22%2C%22A1ETZ07YQZY88F%22%2C%22A16BL2UYBZ0O36%22%2C%22ALX0WJAW2JCAA%22%2C%22A38SGHUQ2XJYF3%22%2C%22A35MTTFCKJ9E7%22%2C%22A1ETZ07YQZY88F%22%2C%22A16BL2UYBZ0O36%22%2C%22ALX0WJAW2JCAA%22%2C%22A1ETZ07YQZY88F%22%2C%22A440WI8T3KOAO%22%2C%22A3F3AQQ33U02B5%22%5D","rId":"1GTGN01SM21QXNZNQZNY","redirectUrl":"#?pf_rd_p=e1786f47-3a13-4adc-82d3-0c9417adcf24&pf_rd_s=desktop-bestsellers-1&pf_rd_t=36701&pf_rd_i=desktop&pf_rd_m=A1AJ19PSB66TGU&pf_rd_r=1GTGN01SM21QXNZNQZNY&pf_rd_r=1GTGN01SM21QXNZNQZNY&pf_rd_p=e1786f47-3a13-4adc-82d3-0c9417adcf24"},
          dataType: 'text',
          cache: false,
          contentType: 'application/x-www-form-urlencoded; charset=utf-8',
          timeout: 40000,
          success: function(data) {
              data = eval('('+data+')');
              var contentHtml = data.contentHtml;
	              
              for (var i=0;i<6;i++){
                $('.cn-right-trail-banner .cn-right-trail-banner-holder').append(contentHtml[i]);
                $('.cn-right-trail-banner .cn-right-trail-banner-holder .bannerBlock:eq('+i+')').css({'background-color':bannerBackgroundColorArray[i]});
                //$('.cn-right-trail-banner .cn-right-trail-banner-holder .bannerBlock:eq('+i+') .bannerBlockBackground .bannerLeftContent .glName').css({'color':bannerBackgroundColorArray[i]});
              }
              //Bind hover event
             $('.cn-right-trail-banner .cn-right-trail-banner-holder .bannerBlock').hover(
                function(){
                    $(this).find('.promotionUrl').css({'color':'#E47911'});
                },
                function(){
                    $(this).find('.promotionUrl').css({'color':'#767676'});
                }
            );
          }
      });
  }
  
  Render();
}
 
if (typeof amznJQ !== 'undefined'){
  amznJQ.available('jQuery',function(){
      var $ = jQuery;
      amznJQ.available('cf').execute(function(){
          CNRightTrailBanner($);
      });
  });
} else if (typeof P !== 'undefined') {
  P.when('A').execute(function(a) {
      var $ = a.$, jQuery = a.$;
      P.when('cf').execute(function(){
          CNRightTrailBanner($);
      });
  });
} 

</script>

  <div class='sidekick' id='desktop-sidekick-5'>
    
<div id="cnFloatBannerOutDiv" style="display:none;margin:0px;height:120px;width:600px;position:fixed;bottom:0px;right:0px;margin:auto;left:0;z-index:101;"><div id="cnFloatBannerBackgroundColor" style="margin:0px;background-color:white;filter:alpha(opacity=0);opacity:0;height:120px;width:600px;"></div><div id="cnFloatBannerImgDiv" style="position:absolute;margin:0px;height:120px;width:600px;bottom:0px;left:0px;"><div ><a href="/b/458-5905564-5122958/ref=cnfloatbannerbottom?_encoding=UTF8&ie=UTF8&ie=UTF8&node=1882308071&tag=mar_floating_banner-23&pf_rd_p=913b50c4-0fe5-4476-8d5d-866b5b1aeee7&pf_rd_s=desktop-sidekick-5&pf_rd_t=36701&pf_rd_i=desktop&pf_rd_m=A1AJ19PSB66TGU&pf_rd_r=1GTGN01SM21QXNZNQZNY&pf_rd_r=1GTGN01SM21QXNZNQZNY&pf_rd_p=913b50c4-0fe5-4476-8d5d-866b5b1aeee7"><img src="https://images-cn.ssl-images-amazon.com/images/G/28/ludan/2016/1500_300_PC_Gateway._CB511026691_.png" width=600 height=120px></a></div></div><div id="cnFloatBannerImgClose" style="cursor:pointer;position:absolute;top:0px;left:570px;width:30px;height:30px;background-color:white;filter:alpha(opacity=0);opacity:0;"></div></div>

<script type="text/javascript">
    if(typeof P !== 'undefined') {
        P.when('A', 'ready').execute(function(A) {
            var name="floatingBannerOnGateway";
            var expireHrs=168;
            checkCookie(name,A);
            A.$("#cnFloatBannerImgClose").click(function(){
                setCookie("floatingBannerOnGateway","floatingBannerOnGateway",expireHrs);
                A.$("#cnFloatBannerOutDiv").hide();
            });
            var $div=A.$("#cnFloatBannerImgDiv");
            var $bgc=A.$("#cnFloatBannerBackgroundColor");
            hoverDiv($div,$bgc);
        });
    } 
    function checkCookie(name,A){
        var cookieVal=getCookie(name);
        if(cookieVal){
            A.$("#cnFloatBannerOutDiv").css({'display':'none'});
        }else{
            A.$("#cnFloatBannerOutDiv").css({'display':'block'});
        }
    }
    function setCookie(name,value,expireHrs){
        expireHrs=parseInt(expireHrs);
        if(expireHrs){
            var date=new Date();
            date.setTime(date.getTime()+(expireHrs*3600*1000));
            var expires="; expires="+date.toGMTString();
        } else {
            var expires="";
        }
        document.cookie=name+"="+value+expires+"; path=/";
    }
    function getCookie(name){
        var strCookie=document.cookie;
        var arrCookie=strCookie.split("; ");
        for(var i=0;i<arrCookie.length;i++){
            var arr=arrCookie[i].split("=");
            if(arr[0]==name) return arr[1];
        }
        return "";
    }
    function hoverDiv($div,$bgc){
        $div.hover(
            function(){
                var opa=0*1.1;
                $bgc.css({'opacity':''+opa/100});
                $bgc.css({'filter':'alpha(opacity='+opa+')'});
            },
            function(){
                var opa=0;
                $bgc.css({'opacity':''+opa/100});
                $bgc.css({'filter':'alpha(opacity='+opa+')'});

            });
    }
</script>
  </div>
    <hr class='slot-hr desktop-sidekick-5-hr' />


  </div>

    </div></div>
